Issue.creator: georgexie2018
Issue.summary: Failure to instantiate chaincodes on channels
Issue.description: This pertains to Hyperledger Fabric 1.2 and 1.3. The app run very well on HLF1.1. After updating to 1.2.1 or 1.3.0 with HLF first-network sampleÂ configtx.yaml. It fails at chanincode instantiation.
